bibl.title: with the assistance of S.P. Vleeming, The Eponymous Priests of Ptolemaic Egypt. Chronological Lists of the Priests of Alexandria and Ptolemais with a Study of the Demotic Transcriptions of Their Names. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXIV.)
